snippet: The police said they were seeking William Smith, 53, in the death of a man at a homeless shelter in Manhattan and in the attempted robbery of a cabdriver in Queens.
abstract: New York City police seek William Smith in connection with murder of Marcus Guerreiro in Manhattan homeless shelter and subsequent attempted robbery of livery-cab driver in Queens.
lead_paragraph: The police said they were seeking William Smith, 53, in the death of a man at a homeless shelter in Manhattan and in the attempted robbery of a cabdriver in Queens.

headline.main: Man Sought in Homeless Shelter Death May Have Slashed Cabdriver, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Police Seek Man With Ties  to Shelter Death and Slashing
